configEntry.name: logging.loggerClass
configEntry.description:
The class to use for providing Logger instances from within the LoggingSystem. The default is "\upro\util\logging\Log4PhpLogger".
Alternatives are: \upro\util\logging\NullLogger

configEntry.name: logging.log4php.configuration
configEntry.description:
The configuration value passed to log4php::Logger.configure() The default is the default configuration of Log4PHP. This value only comes into effect when the Log4PhpLogger is used.
Possible strings are a .xml file or an .php file containing the configuration

configEntry.name: database.server
configEntry.description: The address of the host running the MySQL database. Default: localhost

configEntry.name: database.userName
configEntry.description: The user name for connecting to the database Default: upro

configEntry.name: database.databaseName
configEntry.description: The name of the database to choose. Default: upro_live
